information: The KUHN Group offers a wide range of agricultural equipment to satisfy all the expectations of farming professionals. Whether you are a farmer or a contractor, you will find the equipment most suited to your needs: ploughs from 2 to 12 parts, earth-working machinery, and a broad range of sowing products.Our drill and single-seeders can be adapted to all types of sowing. Moreover, the range has been advantageously developed with combined seeders. For fertilizing operations, our fertilizer spreaders guarantee precision and ease of adjustment; manure spreaders contribute to the optimum management of organic material. Our brand is highly renowned for its haymaking machinery and has over 33 models of haymakers: we have what you need for all your fodder harvesting operations. As for livestock raising and landscape maintenance material, our range of products satisfies the most exacting professionals.
keywords: Agricultural systems and equipment, Spraying equipment, agricultural, Fodder and straw, haymaking machinery, manure spreaders
